content: Interesting list. Good stuff to look up next time I visit one of the local chain or independent bookstores for used or new. We have several good ones in the area in the PNW: Village Bookstore in Bellingham, Barnes and Noble — several Seattle area locations, Twice Used Books in Seattle, Elliott Bay Bookstore in Seattle, Third Place Books (new and used there) — several Seattle locations. Could use the Stephen King, Steal book and the editing guides.
